(:action separate

                     (inventory ?actor ?method))

(:action freeze_or_thaw
  ; General action to either freeze or thaw an item
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?state - state ?container - container)
  :precondition (and (in ?item ?container) 
                     (separated ?item) 
                     (lined ?container) 
                     (or (and (in_freezer ?item)

                              (not (frozen ?item)) 
                              (equals ?state frozen))))
  :effect (and (when (equals ?state frozen)
                 (and (in_freezer ?item) 
                      (frozen ?item) 
                      (not (pliable ?item))))
               (when (equals ?state thawed)
                 (and (not (in_freezer ?item)) 
                      (not (frozen ?item))
